description: Returns a list of all findings generated by a particular scan.

parameters.name: scanName
parameters.description: The name of the scan you want to retrieve findings from.

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: A list of findings generated by the specified scan.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the finding was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the finding.

nested_items.name: detectorId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the detector that detected the finding in your code. A detector is a defined rule based on industry standards and AWS best practices.

nested_items.name: detectorName
nested_items.description: The name of the detector that identified the security vulnerability in your code.

nested_items.name: detectorTags
nested_items.description: One or more tags or categorizations that are associated with a detector. These tags are defined by type, programming language, or other classification such as maintainability or consistency.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: generatorId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the component that generated a finding such as AmazonCodeGuruSecurity.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for a finding.

nested_items.name: remediation
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details about how to remediate a finding.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the recommended course of action to remediate a finding.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL address to the recommendation for remediating the finding.

nested_items.name: suggestedFixes
nested_items.description: A list of SuggestedFix objects. Each object contains information about a suggested code fix to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The suggested code fix. If applicable, includes code patch to replace your source code.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the suggested code fix and why it is being suggested.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The scanName of the scan that was run on the resource.

nested_items.name: subResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a section of the resource.

nested_items.name: ruleId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the rule that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the finding. Severity can be critical, high, medium, low, or informational. For information on severity levels, see Finding severity in the Amazon CodeGuru Security User Guide.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the finding. A finding status can be open or closed.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the finding.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of finding.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the finding was last updated. Findings are updated when you remediate them or when the finding code location changes.

nested_items.name: vulnerability
nested_items.description: An object that describes the detected security vulnerability.

nested_items.name: codeSnippet
nested_items.description: A list of CodeLine objects that describe where the security vulnerability appears in your code.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The code that contains a vulnerability.

nested_items.name: number
nested_items.description: The code line number.

nested_items.name: endLine
nested_items.description: The last line number of the code snippet where the security vulnerability appears in your code.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the file.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path to the resource with the security vulnerability.

nested_items.name: startLine
nested_items.description: The first line number of the code snippet where the security vulnerability appears in your code.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: itemCount
nested_items.description: The number of times the vulnerability appears in your code.

nested_items.name: referenceUrls
nested_items.description: One or more URL addresses that contain details about a vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relatedVulnerabilities
nested_items.description: One or more vulnerabilities that are related to the vulnerability being described.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token. You can use this in future calls to GetFindings to continue listing results after the current page.
